code.description:
Custom error codes
* AE-1 - Internal processing error
* AE-2 - Incorrect request
* AE-3 - Authentication issue
* AE-4 - Prompt is rejected
* AE-5 - Resource is not found
* AE-6 - API usage rate limit is exceeded
* AE-7 - Method is not allowed

vote.description: Integer representation of feedback given (-1 = negative, 1 = positive).

reviewedAt.description: Datetime when the feedback was reviewed.

likes.description: Amount of likes for a thread or an assistant.

other.description: Count of answers which users disliked and gave "other" as reason.

reviews.description: Amount of reviews for a thread or an assistant.

dislikes.description: Amount of dislikes for a thread or an assistant.

unhelpful.description: Count of answers which users marked as "unhelpful".

repetitive.description: Count of answers which users marked as "repetitive".

unanswered.description: Count of questions for which the assistant provided no answer.
